grouppermissions.name: Browse content
grouppermissions.description: Browse the site structure. This is the base privilege aimed for Anonymous users.
grouppermissions.permissions: Access Transient Objects,Access contents information,Access session data,Query Vocabulary,Search ZCatalog,Use Database Methods,Use mailhost services,View,WebDAV access,WebDAV Unlock items,WebDAV Lock items

grouppermissions.name: Add content
grouppermissions.description: Create Naaya objects. Editing, publishing and deleting them are not granted as a part of thisprivilege.
grouppermissions.permissions: Naaya - Access administrative area,Naaya - Add Naaya Folder objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Document objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Event objects,Naaya - Add Naaya File objects,Naaya - Add Naaya News objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Pointer objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Story objects,Naaya - Add Naaya URL objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Photo,Naaya - Add Naaya Media File objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Contact objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Extended File objects,Naaya - Add Naaya GeoPoint objects,Naaya - Add Naaya Photo Folder,Naaya - Add Naaya SMAP Expert objects,Naaya - Add Naaya SMAP Project objects,Take ownership

grouppermissions.name: Add comments
grouppermissions.description: Posibility to add comments for each type of content.

grouppermissions.name: Edit content
grouppermissions.description: Adding, publishing and deleting are not granted as a part of this privilege. Edit content is only allowed for owners if users do not have the 'Naaya - Publish content' permission.
grouppermissions.permissions: Naaya - Access administrative area,Naaya - Edit content,Take ownership

grouppermissions.name: Copy content
grouppermissions.description: Copy content. Adding, publishing and deleting are not granted as a part of this privilege. In order to be able to paste the copied content, users must have the add permission in the target location.

grouppermissions.name: Publish content
grouppermissions.description: Publish Naaya objects. Adding, editing and deleting are not granted as a part of this privilege.
grouppermissions.permissions: Naaya - Access administrative area,Naaya - Publish content,Take ownership

grouppermissions.name: Delete content
grouppermissions.description: Delete Naaya objects. Adding, publishing and editing are not granted as a part of this privilege. Delete content is only allowed for owners.
grouppermissions.permissions: Naaya - Access administrative area,Naaya - Delete content,Take ownership,Naaya - Manage comments for content

grouppermissions.name: Validate content
grouppermissions.description: Validate Naaya objects. Adding, editing and deleting are not granted as a part of this privilege.
grouppermissions.permissions: Naaya - Access administrative area,Naaya - Validate content,Take ownership

grouppermissions.name: Translate pages
grouppermissions.permissions: Naaya - Access administrative area,Naaya - Translate pages

role.name: Administrator
role.grouppermissions: Browse content,Add content,Add comments,Edit content,Copy content,Publish content,Delete content,Validate content,Translate pages,Manage Users
